title: Prosegur is hiring throughout Brazil: 280 vacancies open with and without experience for Security Guard, Doorman, Driver and General Services Assistant - CPG Click Petroleo e Gas
text:
Prosegur has more than 280 openings throughout Brazil for security guards, doormen, assistants, drivers, and other positions. Opportunities available with and without experience; apply online.
Prosegur, one of the world's largest private security companies, has over 280 openings throughout Brazil, for candidates with and without experience. Opportunities cover a variety of roles, including security guards, doormen, general services assistants, drivers, and other operational and administrative positions. The company is seeking new talent to strengthen its workforce in the areas of property security, cash transportation, facilities, and support services.
As registration is now open and can be done exclusively online, through the company's official platform.
The vacancies are distributed across several regions of the country and offer market-compatible benefits, in addition to real opportunities for internal growth and professional development within a multinational company consolidated in the sector.
Prosegur has vacancies for security guards, doormen, drivers and general services assistants.
The selection process includes candidates with different levels of education and experience, expanding access to people seeking their first job, as well as professionals already working in security, transportation, or general services. The main open positions include:
- Security guard
- Porteiro
- general service assistant
- Armored car driver
- Monitoring center attendant
- Receptionist
- Administrative Assistant
- CCTV Operator
- access controller
- logistics assistant
Opportunities are for different shifts and may vary depending on the Prosegur unit or branch in each state.
Who can apply for Prosegur vacancies?
The company accepts CVs of candidates with and without experience, but requires the professional meet the basic requirements of the position, such as minimum education, driver's license for drivers and, in the case of security guards, it is mandatory to have an up-to-date course and recycling.
Other desirable requirements include:
- Completed elementary or secondary education (depending on the role);
- Time availability;
- Good communication and professional attitude;
- Ability to work in a team and under pressure;
- Commitment and punctuality.
The company values the diversity and inclusion, encouraging the candidacy of women, people with disabilities and professionals over 50 years old.
Benefits offered by Prosegur
Prosegur employees have access to a benefits package that may include:
- Salary compatible with the role and regional minimum wage;
- Transportation vouchers and / or fuel voucher;
- Food allowance or meal;
- Medical and odontologic assistence;
- group life insurance;
- Partnerships with educational institutions and academies;
- Career path and internal training.
These benefits vary according to the unit, position and location, but in general they guarantee a good structure for the worker to perform their duties with safety and stability.
How to apply for Prosegur vacancies
To participate in the selection process, the candidate must access the company's official recruitment page:

In the portal, you can:
- Filter jobs by state, city, or role;
- Read the requirements and duties of each position;
- Create a profile and register your CV directly for the desired vacancy;
- Monitor the progress of the selection process.
The platform is constantly updated, and new positions may appear at any time, especially in metropolitan areas or when expanding contracts.
Prosegur offers career path and stability in the security sector
Operating in more than 25 countries, Prosegur is recognized for its professional management model and ongoing training policies. Employees have opportunities for growth within the company itself, which frequently conducts internal promotions e technical requalifications.
The company also invests in technology and training, ensuring that your employees are able to work efficiently in corporate, industrial, residential environments and large-scale events.
Highlights of Prosegur's job selection
- +280 vacancies open throughout Brazil
- Positions with and without previous experience requirements
- Market-competitive salaries and benefits
- Fully online selection process
- First job or relocation opportunity
- Vacancies for security guards, doormen, drivers, assistants and more
Prosegur's openings represent an excellent opportunity for those looking to enter or re-enter the job market, offering stability, benefits, and real opportunities for professional development. If you're looking for a solid company with a national presence and multinational structure, this could be your chance.
Don't miss the deadline: visit the website, register your CV and participate in the selection process!
